fix serialize/unserialize to json_encode/json_decode

fix image link

Merge pull request #80 from AD7six/patch-1

Correct links after repo move

Update OpauthStrategy.php

If an exit is not introduced at this point and additional output is printed, the JavaScript form redirection fails.

Merge pull request #69 from fjorgemota/patch-1

Fix broken links in README

Merge pull request #68 from laapsaap/patch-2

Updated link to Opauth repo.

Update README.md

Oops i found the new wiki link
forgot to udpate one reference to travis
update readme to point travis build icon to opauth/opauth
Fixes the bug on custom stream options for serverGet(). Fixes #55.

Merge pull request #54 from dn23rus/patch-1

Change default value of $response from null to empty array

Change default value of $response from null to empty array

Line 246 produce warning: array_key_exists() expects parameter 2 to be array, null given...

Merge pull request #53 from andrus7k/patch-1

Fixed a bug on dealing with existing session.

Update Opauth.php

we only start session if it's not running, but we set $response no matter who stared the session

Merge pull request #52 from huglester/patch-1

Fixed invalid github link

Merge pull request #51 from evseevnn/patch-3

Removed unused variables

Merge pull request #50 from evseevnn/patch-2

$found = true; not used

$found = true; not used

Because they do not use the variable $found, was removed redundant logic.

Merge pull request #47 from dhensby/patch-1

Adding SilverStripe Opauth Module

Merge pull request #46 from NoUseFreak/xdebug

Skip tests if xdebug is not available.

MINOR Adding SilverStripe Opauth Module

We created a Opauth module for SilverStripe 3, so I thought I'd add that to the list.
Skip tests if xdebug is not available.

Merge pull request #41 from rkaldung/master

Adding HTTP User-Agent header

Merge pull request #34 from LubosRemplik/master

Vimeo strategy added into list
Vimeo opauth strategy added into README file

Merge pull request #31 from pborreli/typos

Fixed typos
Updated readme with changelog for 0.4.3, new strategies and new plugins.
Fixes #26 a bug where user supplied options for serverPost() was not applied correctly.

Merge pull request #25 from gigablah/master

Use classmap autoload scheme in composer
Corrected the maintainer's name for opauth-bitbucket
Added Silex plugin and Bitbucket strategy.

Merge pull request #20 from sirikkoster/master

Check session_id() instead of $_SESSION

Merge pull request #19 from waxpancake/patch-1

Typo fix.
I think this is a better way to check this

Update example/README.md

Fixed a small typo

Merge pull request #18 from Takehiro-Adachi/removing_atsign

Removed @ for file_get_contents.
removed at sign from file_get_contents which was in OpauthStrategy.php
Check if session is already started before starting one. Related: #17

Merge pull request #17 from Claymm/master

Don't start the session if it has already started.
Don't start the session if it has already started.

Merge pull request #16 from Claymm/master

Bugfix in error message
Bugfix : Error message did not get the strategy right.
Added a note on primary support channel
Main README with more in-depth steps
Updated README at example/ with more in-depth steps

mapProfile() to help mapping user profile to auth response

without having to keep doing if (!empty()) at strategy
PHP notice bug for undeclared var
Introduces clientGet() for client-side GET with data.
Explicitly set $arg_separator for http_build_query() as XAMPP changed the default to '&'. [Thanks Azrain]
testRunNonExistingStrategy now expects PHPUnit_Framework_Error instead of PHPUnit_Framework_Error_Notice
Suppress PHP notice for undefined index:action. Related: uzyn/cakephp-opauth#2
Eliminate aliases. Strategy's internal properties are now prefixed with strategy_ instead of opauth_, eg. strategy_class, instead of opauth_strategy_name.
Gives a better E_USER_NOTICE when no strategy is requested.
Updated README with more explicit instructions
Searches strategy_dir/opauth-strategy for the case where a user simply clones a git repository without specifying Strategy name as dir name
Added link to Opauth Google Group
requireStrategy() now able to make use of autoloader, like that of Composer, to load strategies
Added keywords and suggest packages to get started
Added an E_USER_NOTICE for Opauth request without specifying any strategies
Added strategy_dir key to advanced opauth conf
serverGet(), wrapper of httpRequest for server-side GET
Reinstated Opauth to support basic server-side HTTP calls via file_get_contents
Removing server-side HTTP call functions from Opauth. Strategy to handle own server-side HTTP mechanics. Related: #4
POST and GET transports now does serialize() and base64 encoding to make data transport safe
Transform boolean into 1 or 0 to make it safe across all Opauth HTTP transports. Closes #6
Security env values still had to be made known to OpauthStrategy to sign auth response. Closes #5
OpauthStrategy is no longer aware of Opauth instance. #5
Prepare safe env values to pass to Strategy. #5
envReplace function is now a static function with mandatory $dictionary param. Issue #5

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:uzyn/opauth

Conflicts:
	lib/Opauth/Opauth.php
Updated with quick start, support channels, etc
Overwrite provider for auth response to strategy's name (not class name)
Opauth now allows a single strategy to be used for multiple authentications of the same type. Closes #2
Opauth related parameters in $strategy no longer prefixed with _
URI => URL for Opauth to keep things a bit more standardized
Config keys, switched from Human.body to human_body (doing away with dot notation and capitalization)
Removed notes on webroot in sample config
Callback() in Opauth handles error callback now too
Made a few utility functions static
httpRequest now does some basic error handling
Separated callback transport logic from callback() to allow shipment of error data using the same function
Link to Opauth on PHP frameworks
Updated Opauth config file for example to include Callback.uri
A separate callback file as an example on how Opauth callback should be handled
Opauth can now be instantiated without running
Deleted individial specific strategies from main Opauth framework
Moved OAuth strategy into its own Git repo: opauth-oauth
Twitter auth, based on Opauth OAuth
OAuth strategy for developers to extend upon

Not forwarding path as $_GET parameter to index.php

This would now make Opauth require mod_rewrite
Moved tmhOAuth from vendors to Vendor (PSR-0)
parent::contstruct is not needed for Facebook
Destroy auth response's session after reading it
"If you are using Opauth plugin for framework, you are very likely not requiring opauth.conf.php"
Updated default and advanced config files for Strategy change
Updated config key to Strategy instead of Strategies  to make the schema more PSR-0 compliant (Strategy name = Class name)
Output of Opauth is now known as Auth response
Separated default config file into basic (simple) and advanced (full)
Callback now supports 3 different callback_transport types (get, post, session)
Recursively converts multidimensional array into POST-friendly single dimensional array
callback_transport settings at opauth.conf.php.default and default option being session
Set default strategy's action to 'request' so that when an action isn't specified or does not exist, Opauth automatically calls request

Recursively convert all objects in $auth into array before sending through HTTP as object doesn't send very consistently.

Trying to avoid the use of serialize() if possible
* TODO: adds pass by session support as well if domain of callback_uri is the same as Opauth's
Updated hash initial input to be free of timestamp
Updated signature of $auth to be print_r of the full $auth to prevent tampering with non-hashed values of $auth
Packs $auth nicely and send to callback_uri
envReplace of OpauthStrategy now uses that on Opauth
Allows the use of {} for setting of environmental values of Opauth.
Trigger E_USER_NOTICE for Security.salt value that isn't changed
Updated opauth.conf.php.default with Security.salt and Security.iteration values
Hash, appending salt at every iteration
Sign $auth (sha1 300 times and timestamped) before passing to clalback_url
Prepared Facebook's auth results into nicely formatted $auth
Exchange FB OAuth code with access_code and queries me data from FB Graph API
httpRequest function for simple HTTP requests with file_get_contents
Moved redirect() function to OpauthStrategy from Opauth
Opauth now automatically detects HTTP or HTTPS connection
Do not attempt to strip double slashes in URL with a simple str_replace
Include other parameters for OAuth Dialog
loads HTTP_HOST into Opauth config and add complete_path to Opauth->env
Better env variables replacement. O(n) instead of O(n^2)
Updated all accessors of Opauth object
Duplicating values of config into env (Opauth) so that accessing such values is consistent
Moved individual strategy into Strategy/NAME/NAME.php to allow each strategy to be completely standalone in its directory
Fixed a bug on loading the values of strategy
Sends strategy configs to individual strategy
Moved conf file to webroot for consistency
Updated webroot index.php handler to load config
ignore local testing files at webroot
Removed debug.php that declares functions in global namespace
Refactored code to avoid declaring any functions or vars or constants in global space
Git is confused. Moved to a tmp file
Some renaming to follow phpfig naming standards
htaccesses and webroot, following CakePHP structures
Shift things around to follow naming standards
